title: Grampa's monster movies
creator_credit: Amvest Video, Bertram Siegelson and Peter Zasuly
brief_description: Grampa Munster leads the viewer through an exploration of classic monster movie trailers. Trailers featured include: House of Frankenstein (1944), House of Dracula (1945), Son of Dracula (1943), Dracula’s daughter (1936), Dracula (1931), The Invisible man returns (1940), The Invisible woman (1940), Invisible agent (1942), The Invisible ray (1936), Frankenstein (1931), Frankenstein meets the Wolf Man (1943), Bride of Frankenstein (1935), The ghost of Frankenstein (1942), Abbott and Costello meet Frankenstein (1948), Phantom of the opera (1943), The Climax (19??), The Werewolf of London (1935), The Mystery of Marie Roget (1942), Murders in the Rue Morgue (1932), Flesh and fantasy (1943), The Wolfman (1941), The Mummy (1932), The Mummy’s hand (1940), The Mummy’s curse (1944), The Black cat (1934), The Cat creeps (1946), Black Friday (1940), and Horror island (1941).
